title: Anthropic launches Cowork, a Claude Desktop agent that works in your files — no coding required
what_happened: Anthropic released Cowork on Monday, a new AI agent capability that extends the power of its wildly successful Claude Code tool to non-technical users — and according to company insiders, the team built the entire feature in approximately a week and a half, largely using Claude Code itself.The launch marks a major inflection point in the race to de
technical_takeaway: Reflects incremental but meaningful progress in applied AI capabilities and tooling.

primary_opportunity: Early-mover advantage for teams that operationalize AI effectively.
